nodes.text: Sorschi was the wife of the human female Ackmena. In the year 0 BBY, Sorschi lived on Delkin Ridge on the planet Tatooine with Ackmena, who worked night shifts as a bartender at Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina in the spaceport of Mos Eisley.
Sorschi was first mentioned in the short story "We Don't Serve Their Kind Here," which was written by Chuck Wendig and released as part of the From a Certain Point of View anthology book in 2017.
